attributes.action: Release current recovery rate for covid 19
attributes.additional_details:
people everyone has been lied too.we want the truth 

We deserve this! 

No more lies!
attributes.background:
we have all seen the deaths and positive cases.
I think its about time we was told how many have RECOVERD we are being kept in the dark about way too much
Let's see just how many have recovered. And get the true positive case number.We all know you have over estimated
